directions: Whisk the cream in a mixing bowl until stiff peaks form. Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the cream should form a sharp peak that holds its shape. Season with the white pepper, hot sauce, and horseradish. Stir to combine.
ingredients: 1 pinch white pepper, or to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®) (optional)
title: Whipped Horseradish Sauce
